name: SlashTags
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
**This cog is in beta testing.** Report any bugs/log output in *#support_phen-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).

Thanks for installing SlashTags!
This cog requires `slashinjector` by Kowlin/Sentinel to be loaded to parse slash command responses (<https://github.com/Kowlin/Sentinel>).
author: PhenoM4n4n
